items.name: Acantha of Phocis

●	Phocis

+	Might
+	Perception

-	Magic
-	Social

+Logic
+Persuasion
+Presence

-Magic

+	Agility
+	Perception

-	Social

items.name: Deianeira of Sparta

+Fortitude
+Will

-Intelligence
-Social

items.name: Elpis of Thessaloniki

+	Persuasion

-	Physique
